dev_unstable.name: dev:fd4a91a8a22bcd14a1ff9239e6d07bebfc50447b
dev_unstable.change:
ready release a1.0.0 (#18)

* refactored ModLoader-class & optimizations around it

* added new mod.json format

* added @G.modloader(<modname>, <eventname>, [<info>])-support

* improved mod loading

* fixed two issues related to not correctly setting the block state

* added --fullscreen flag

* fixed memory leak with block-inventories and with block-instances 

* fixed offhand slot reset on inventory close

* fixed crash on deletion of the build-folder

* improved error message when save not found

* improved personal directory logging

* improved exception handling by logger

* rewritten how generation tasks are stored, fixing some bugs including some memory leaks

* improved world gen screen

* fixed bug that adding items to inventory fails leading into empty start chest

* API improvements

* read a1.0.0 release

dev_unstable.name: dev:d4a1c07418eff6198997ba147bec44fcf0d9b3ae
dev_unstable.change:
version 20w14a (#11)


* code cleanup

* improved saves by storing block coordinates relative to chunks

* rewritten inventory slot handling to support dragging over more than one slot

* added system for so-called "shift-containers" storing how to shift items around in the inventory

* fixed label rendering [intern 162]

* fixed looking-at position-label [intern 148] and an loading exception [intern 163]

* entity functionality implementation

* implemented base entity renderer, added player model with skins

* entities are now saved in chunk data

* added /summon command

* added loading phase for entities

* support for non-full skin files [64x32 pixel instead of 64x64]

dev_unstable.name: dev:078f0f5e2120bea20ac60df75bd3bf2f747d60ad
dev_unstable.change:
version 20w12b (#9)

* added dimension -1 and 1 to dimension table [no world generator provided at the moment]

* updated library pyglet to 1.5.1

* added world save on window close

* added three new blocks: mycelium, podzol and barrier

* added support for .lang files

* added support for rotation changes in elements of block-models
